task_details.task_instructions: Construya un modelo predictivo para determinar la probabilidad de supervivencia a 5 años para las personas diagnosticadas con carcinoma broncogénico en estadio III basado en sus datos clínicos, genómicos y terapéuticos.  El modelo debe incorporar el análisis de regresión lineal multivariante, el análisis de supervivencia utilizando el método Kaplan-Meier y el modelado de regresión de Cox.

mathematical_formulation.multivariate_regression: Y = β0 + β1X1 + β2X2 + ... + βnXn + ε

Das Modell umfasst eine multivariate lineare Regressionsanalyse, die Überlebensanalyse über die Kaplan-Meier-Methode und die Cox-Regressionsmodellierung.

task_details.mathematical_formulation: The likelihood ratio (LR) for a diagnosis can be computed as LR = sensitivity / (1 - specificity).  The post-test probability of a disease can be determined using Bayes' theorem: P(D|T) = (P(T|D) * P(D)) / P(T), where P(D|T) represents the probability of the disease given the test result, P(T|D) represents the probability of the test result given the disease, P(D) represents the pre-test probability of the disease, and P(T) represents the probability of the test result.

task_details.task_instructions: Étant donné une cohorte de patients présentant divers stades de néphropathie, prédire la probabilité de développer une insuffisance rénale au cours des 5 prochaines années.  Utilisez un ensemble complet de données cliniques, de laboratoire et démographiques pour développer un modèle prédictif. Le modèle doit prendre en compte des facteurs tels que le taux de filtration glomérulaire estimé (EGFR), les niveaux d'albuminurie, les conditions comorbides et les médicaments prescrits. La prédiction doit être validée à l'aide de méthodes statistiques et donner un score de risque pour chaque patient.
task_details.mathematical_formulation: The risk score for progression to Renal Failure can be formulated using a logistic regression model: logit(P) = β0 + β1*eGFR + β2*albuminuria + β3*age + β4*gender + β5*comorbidities + β6*medications, where P is the probability of progression to Renal Failure, and β0, β1, ..., β6 are the coefficients to be estimated from the data.

task_details.task_instructions: Angesichts einer Kohorte von Patienten mit unterschiedlichen Stadien der Nephropathie prognostizieren die Wahrscheinlichkeit einer Nierenversagen innerhalb der nächsten 5 Jahre. Das Modell sollte Faktoren wie geschätzte glomeruläre Filtrationsrate (EGFR), Albuminurie, Komorbiditäten und verschriebene Arzneimittel ausmachen. Die Vorhersage sollte unter Verwendung statistischer Methoden validiert werden und für jeden Patienten einen Risikowert bereitstellen.

task_details.task_instructions: Bestimmen Sie die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass ein Patient innerhalb von 48 Stunden eine akute Nierenverletzung infolge der Lebererkrankung entwickelt, wobei Daten aus den elektronischen Gesundheitsakten (EHRS) des Patienten verwendet werden.  Consider the severity of underlying hepatic disease, laboratory values, and patient demographics. Provide a prediction, detailing how these factors impact the likelihood of developing this condition. Optimize the Systemic Inflammatory Response Syndrome Index (SIRSI). SIRSI and medical formulas are based on laboratory markers, infection status, lactic acidosis, and multi-organ dysfunction score (MODS).
task_details.mathematical_formulation: Predicted AKI = f(Creatinine, Bilirubin, INR, ALT, AST, Lactate, MAP,CVP,CO,SIRSI,MODS). Where f is a complex prediction function governed by hospital algorithms including leaky softmax considering different stages of cirrhosis.  Also INCLUDING the following equations: Child-Pugh Score = Bilirubin + INR + Ascites Grade + Encephalopathy, SIRSI = 2.77X (Lactate) +1.3x(MODS).... with boundary conditions that SIRS should not result in mortality without initial variable SIRS control.

mathematical_formulation.GRACE_score: GRACE score = 1.23 × (age/10) + 0.63 (if heart rate > 70 bpm) + 0.54 (if systolic blood pressure < 140 mmHg) + 0.95 (if creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL) + 0.94 (if Killip class > 1) + 0.62 (if cardiac arrest at admission) + 0.70 (if ST-segment deviation) + 0.53 (if elevated cardiac enzymes)
mathematical_formulation.Charlson_Comorbidity_Index: CCI = 1 (if myocardial infarction) + 1 (if congestive heart failure) + 1 (if peripheral vascular disease) + 1 (if cerebrovascular disease) + 1 (if dementia) + 1 (if chronic pulmonary disease) + 1 (if connective tissue disease) + 1 (if peptic ulcer disease) + 1 (if mild liver disease) + 1 (if diabetes without chronic complications) + 2 (if hemiplegia) + 2 (if moderate or severe renal disease) + 2 (if diabetes with chronic complications) + 2 (if any tumor) + 2 (if leukemia) + 2 (if lymphoma) + 3 (if moderate or severe liver disease) + 6 (if metastatic solid tumor) + 6 (if AIDS)

task_details.task_instructions: Erstellen Sie ein umfassendes Vorhersagemodell, um das individuelle Risiko einer Nierenbeeinträchtigung bei kritisch kranken Patienten zu bewerten, die in einer intensiven Versorgung behandelt werden und elektronische Gesundheitsdaten (EHR) nutzen. Das Modell sollte die zeitabhängigen Änderungen der physiologischen Messungen, Labortestbefunde und medizinischen Verfahren einbeziehen, um die Wahrscheinlichkeit eines Nierenversagens innerhalb von 48 Stunden zu prognostizieren. Die Ausgabe sollte eine detaillierte mathematische Formulierung, eine Liste der Schlüsselelemente und deren Interaktionen sowie eine robuste Bewertungsmetrik für die Modellleistung enthalten.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
The prediction model can be formulated using a recurrent neural network (RNN) architecture such as a Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) network to capture the temporal patterns in physiological measurements, lab results, and medical procedures. The model's output at time t, P(Renal Failure|t), can be expressed as:

P(Renal Failure|t) = σ(W_out * h_t + b_out)

where:
- σ is the sigmoid activation function,
- W_out and b_out are the weights and bias of the output layer,
- h_t is the hidden state at time t, which is computed by the LSTM network based on the input features X_t = [vital_signs_t, lab_results_t, interventions_t].

The hidden state h_t is updated recursively as:

h_t = LSTM(X_t, h_t-1)

The loss function for training the model can be defined as the binary cross-entropy loss:

L = -[y_t * log(P(Renal Failure|t)) + (1 - y_t) * log(1 - P(Renal Failure|t))]

where y_t is the binary label indicating the occurrence of renal failure at time t.

task_details.task_instructions: Construisez un modèle de prédiction complet pour évaluer le risque individuel de développer une insuffisance rénale chez les patients en soins intensifs, en tirant parti des données de dossier de santé électronique.  Le modèle doit intégrer les changements en fonction du temps dans les mesures physiologiques, les résultats des tests de laboratoire et les traitements médicaux pour prévoir le début de l'insuffisance rénale dans les 48 prochaines heures. Le résultat final devrait inclure une description mathématique complète, une liste d'éléments pertinents et leurs relations, et une métrique d'évaluation des performances fiable.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
The prediction model can be formulated using a temporal convolutional network (TCN) to capture the temporal dynamics of the physiological measurements, lab test outcomes, and medical treatments. The model's output at time t, P(Renal Failure|t), can be expressed as:

P(Renal Failure|t) = σ(W_out * h_t + b_out)

where:
- σ is the sigmoid activation function,
- W_out and b_out are the weights and bias of the output layer,
- h_t is the hidden state at time t, which is computed by the TCN based on the input features X_t = [vital_signs_t, lab_results_t, interventions_t].

The hidden state h_t is updated recursively as:

h_t = TCN(X_t, h_t-1)

The loss function for training the model can be defined as the binary cross-entropy loss:

L = -[y_t * log(P(Renal Failure|t)) + (1 - y_t) * log(1 - P(Renal Failure|t))]

where y_t is the binary label indicating the occurrence of Renal Failure at time t.

task_details.mathematical_formulation:
The prediction model will use a recurrent neural network (RNN), specifically a Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) network, to process the time series data of physiological measurements, lab values, and treatments. The model's output at time t, P(Renal Failure|t), is given by:

P(Renal Failure|t) = σ(W_out * h_t + b_out)

where:
- σ is the sigmoid activation function,
- W_out and b_out are the weights and bias of the output layer,
- h_t is the hidden state at time t, computed by the LSTM based on the input features X_t = [vital_signs_t, lab_results_t, interventions_t].

The hidden state h_t is updated recursively using the LSTM's internal mechanisms:

h_t = LSTM(X_t, h_t-1)

The model is trained using the binary cross-entropy loss function:

L = -[y_t * log(P(Renal Failure|t)) + (1 - y_t) * log(1 - P(Renal Failure|t))]

where y_t is the binary label indicating the occurrence of renal failure at time t.

task_details.task_instructions: Effectuer un diagnostic différentiel pour un patient présentant une douleur aiguë au ventre, compte tenu de diverses causes potentielles telles que l'inflammation de l'annexe, l'inflammation diverticulaire, l'inflammation de la vésicule biliaire, l'inflammation du pancréas et l'approvisionnement en sang compromis aux intestins.  Générez une liste prioritaire de diagnostics potentiels en fonction des antécédents du patient fournis, des analyses de laboratoire et des résultats d'imagerie.  Soutenez chaque diagnostic avec un raisonnement clinique pertinent et des directives médicales établies.

computed_tomography.findings: mild fat stranding in the right lower quadrant

task_details.mathematical_formulation: The differential diagnostic procedure involves computing the posterior probability of each disease given the clinical information using Bayes' theorem: P(D|Data) = [P(Data|D) * P(D)] / P(Data), where D denotes the disease and Data represents the clinical, laboratory, and imaging results. The prioritization of diagnoses is determined by these probabilities, with the highest probability indicating the most probable diagnosis.

task_details.task_instructions: Realice un diagnóstico diferencial para un paciente que se presente con dolor agudo del vientre, considerando diversas causas potenciales, como la inflamación del apéndice, la inflamación diverticular, la inflamación de la vesícula biliar, la inflamación del páncreas y el suministro de sangre mesentérica comprometida.  Proporcione una lista clasificada de diagnósticos potenciales basados ​​en los datos clínicos suministrados, los resultados de laboratorio y los resultados de las imágenes.  Custenciar cada diagnóstico con razonamiento clínico relevante y pautas basadas en la evidencia.

task_details.task_instructions: Determine la mejor estrategia de tratamiento personalizada para un paciente diagnosticado con adenocarcinoma en estadio IV del pulmón que exhibe una mutación activadora de EGFR.  Considere las características genómicas, comorbilidades y terapias previas del paciente. El objetivo es optimizar la supervivencia libre de progresión (PFS) al tiempo que minimiza los efectos secundarios negativos.
task_details.mathematical_formulation: Maximize PFS = f(treatment_strategy, genomic_characteristics, co-morbidities, prior_therapies) such that side_effects ≤ threshold.  Here, PFS is a function of the treatment strategy, genomic characteristics, co-morbidities, and prior therapies; side_effects are constrained to be below a specified threshold.

task_details.task_instructions: Determine la mejor estrategia de tratamiento individualizada para un paciente diagnosticado con adenocarcinoma en estadio IV del pulmón que exhibe una mutación EGFR.  Considere la composición genética del paciente, las condiciones coexistentes y las experiencias de tratamiento pasadas. El objetivo es aumentar la supervivencia libre de progresión (PFS) al tiempo que minimiza los efectos secundarios negativos.
task_details.mathematical_formulation: Maximize PFS = f(treatment_strategy, genetic_profile, comorbidities, prior_treatment_history) such that adverse_effects ≤ threshold.  Where PFS is a function of the treatment strategy, genetic profile, comorbidities, and prior treatment history, and adverse_effects are constrained to be below a specified threshold.

task_details.task_instructions: Determine la mejor estrategia de tratamiento individualizada para un paciente diagnosticado con adenocarcinoma en estadio IV del pulmón que exhibe una alteración de EGFR.  Considere la composición genómica del paciente, las comorbilidades y las terapias anteriores. El objetivo es optimizar la supervivencia libre de progresión (PFS) al tiempo que limita los efectos secundarios negativos.
task_details.mathematical_formulation: Maximize PFS = f(treatment_strategy, genomic_makeup, comorbidities, prior_therapies) such that adverse_effects ≤ threshold.  Where PFS is a function of the treatment strategy, genomic makeup, comorbidities, and prior therapies, and adverse_effects are constrained to be below a defined threshold.

task_details.task_instructions: Développer une stratégie de traitement complète pour un patient présentant des antécédents médicaux complexes, englobant plusieurs comorbidités et troubles hérités rares. La stratégie devrait optimiser les interventions de médicaments, tenir compte des prédispositions génétiques et minimiser les réponses négatives des médicaments.  Fournir une justification détaillée pour chaque décision de traitement, y compris les interactions médicamenteuses potentielles et les conséquences génétiques.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
The treatment strategy should minimize the likelihood of negative medication responses and maximize therapeutic benefit. This can be framed as a multi-objective optimization problem:

minimize f(x) = w1 * ADR_risk(x) - w2 * Therapeutic_efficacy(x)

subject to:
GFR_constraint: eGFR(x) >= 30
Genetic_constraint: COMT_polymorphism(x) == 'Val158Met'
Drug_interaction_constraint: Interaction_score(x) <= threshold

where x denotes the set of medications and their dosages, w1 and w2 are weights assigned to the objectives, and the constraints ensure the strategy's safety and effectiveness given the patient's genetic and clinical profile.

task_details.task_instructions: Développer une stratégie de traitement complète pour un patient présentant des antécédents médicaux complexes, englobant plusieurs maladies concomitantes et des troubles héréditaires rares.  Le plan doit optimiser l'utilisation des médicaments, tenir compte des prédispositions génétiques et minimiser la probabilité de réponses négatives sur les médicaments.  Fournir une explication détaillée pour chaque choix de traitement, y compris les interactions potentielles des médicaments et les conséquences génétiques.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
The treatment strategy should minimize the probability of negative medication responses and maximize therapeutic effectiveness.  This can be framed as a multi-objective optimization problem:

minimize f(x) = w1 * ADR_probability(x) - w2 * Therapeutic_benefit(x)

subject to:
GFR_constraint: eGFR(x) >= 30
Genetic_constraint: BDNF_polymorphism(x) == 'Val66Met'
Drug_interaction_constraint: Interaction_score(x) <= threshold

where x denotes the set of medications and their dosages, w1 and w2 are weights assigned to the objectives, and the constraints ensure the treatment strategy is safe and effective given the patient's genetic and clinical profile.

task_details.task_instructions: Entwickeln Sie eine umfassende Behandlungsstrategie für einen Patienten mit einer komplizierten Anamnese, einschließlich mehrerer koexistierender Erkrankungen und ungewöhnlichen ererbten Krankheiten. Der Plan sollte die Auswahl der Medikamente optimieren, genetische Veranlagungen berücksichtigen und die Wahrscheinlichkeit negativer Medikamentenreaktionen verringern. Geben Sie für jede Behandlungsentscheidung eine detaillierte Rechtfertigung, einschließlich potenzieller Wechselwirkungen mit Arzneimitteln und genetischen Auswirkungen.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
The treatment strategy should minimize the probability of adverse drug events (ADEs) and maximize therapeutic effectiveness.  This can be framed as a multi-objective optimization problem:

minimize f(x) = w1 * ADE_risk(x) - w2 * Therapeutic_efficacy(x)

subject to:
GFR_constraint: eGFR(x) >= 30
Genetic_constraint: APOE_polymorphism(x) == 'e4/e4'
Drug_interaction_constraint: Interaction_score(x) <= threshold

where x represents the set of medications and their dosages, w1 and w2 are weights assigned to the objectives, and the constraints ensure that the treatment strategy is safe and effective given the patient's genetic and clinical profile.

task_details.task_instructions: Führen Sie eine retrospektive Kohortenstudie durch, um die Wahrscheinlichkeit zu ermitteln, sepsis-induzierte Nierenversagen bei septischen Patienten zu entwickeln, die sich einer kontinuierlichen Nierenersatztherapie (CRRT) unter Verwendung einer anhaltenden Dialyse mit niedriger Effizienz (SLED) unterziehen.  Vergleichen Sie die Sterblichkeitsrate zwischen frühen (innerhalb von 48 Stunden nach dem Krankenhauseintritt) und verzögerten (nach 48 Stunden) Umsetzung von Schlitten.
task_details.mathematical_formulation: P(Sepsis-induced kidney failure | Sepsis, SLED) = (Number of patients with Sepsis-induced kidney failure given early SLED initiation / Total number of patients with early SLED initiation)

task_details.task_instructions: Realice un estudio de cohorte retrospectivo para determinar la probabilidad de desarrollar insuficiencia renal inducida por sepsis en pacientes sépticos que reciben terapia de reemplazo renal continuo (CRRT) utilizando diálisis sostenida de baja eficiencia (SLED).  Compare la tasa de mortalidad entre las primeras 48 horas posteriores al ingreso hospitalario) y retrasada (después de 48 horas) de implementación de trineo.
task_details.mathematical_formulation: P(Sepsis-induced kidney failure | Sepsis, SLED) = (Number of patients with Sepsis-induced kidney failure given early SLED initiation / Total number of patients with early SLED initiation)

task_details.task_instructions: Créez une stratégie de traitement complète pour un patient ayant des antécédents médicaux complexes, englobant de multiples conditions de co-occurrence, des troubles génétiques héréditaires et des sensibilités spécifiques des médicaments. La stratégie devrait hiérarchiser la minimisation des réactions médicamenteuses négatives, la maximisation de l'efficacité du traitement et la prise en compte du bien-être du patient.  La stratégie devrait détailler un plan de médicaments, des recommandations nutritionnelles et un calendrier pour l'évaluation et le suivi continus.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
Optimize the treatment strategy to minimize the likelihood of adverse drug events and maximize therapeutic effectiveness. This can be framed as a multi-objective optimization problem:

maximize E = f(D, I, M)
subject to R(D, I, M) <= T

where:
E = therapeutic effectiveness
D = drug doses
I = nutritional intake
M = monitoring schedule
R = risk of adverse drug events
T = acceptable risk threshold
f = function mapping doses, diet, and monitoring to effectiveness
R = function mapping doses, diet, and monitoring to risk

task_details.task_instructions: Realice una revisión metaanalítica de ensayos clínicos para establecer la dosis óptima de un nuevo medicamento antihipertensivo, considerando la variabilidad en las características del paciente, las enfermedades concurrentes y los factores hereditarios.  El análisis incluirá un examen exhaustivo de la investigación publicada y no publicada, y una evaluación rigurosa de los polimorfismos genéticos CYP2C19 como predictor de la variación de resultados del tratamiento.

studies_included.title: Phase III Trial of Novel Antihypertensive Medication
Phase II Trial of Novel Antihypertensive Medication

task_details.mathematical_formulation: The meta-analysis will utilize a random-effects model to account for between-study variability. The effect size (ES) for each study will be calculated as the standardized mean difference (SMD) in blood pressure reduction.  The overall effect size (ES_overall) will be computed using the DerSimonian-Laird method: ES_overall = ∑(wi * ESi) / ∑wi, where wi is the weight assigned to each study based on its sample size and variance. The influence of CYP2C19 genetic polymorphisms on treatment outcome will be assessed using a mixed-effects model: Y = β0 + β1*CYP2C19_status + β2*dosage + ε, where Y is the blood pressure reduction, β0 is the intercept, β1 and β2 are coefficients for CYP2C19 status and dosage, respectively, and ε is the error term.

task_details.task_instructions: Führen Sie eine Metaanalyse klinischer Studien durch, um die optimale Dosis eines neuen blutdrucksenkenden Medikaments unter Berücksichtigung der Variabilität der Patientenmerkmale, der damit verbundenen Bedingungen und der ererbten Merkmale zu ermitteln.  Die Analyse sollte eine gründliche Untersuchung der veröffentlichten und unveröffentlichten Forschung und eine strenge Bewertung von CYP2C9 -genetischen Polymorphismen als Prädiktor für die Variabilität des Behandlungsergebnisses umfassen.
